snippet.title: Uncover the Deadly Truth in Two Famicom Detective Club Games – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Two deep cuts from Nintendo history are making their debut in North America! In Famicom Detective Club: The Missing Heir and Famicom Detective Club: The Girl Who Stands Behind, dive into two deep narrative mysteries, localized and modernized for Nintendo Switch, launching 5/14. 

Pre-order today. Purchase one of these games on Nintendo eShop and get $10 off the other.

Famicom Detective Club: The Missing Heir:
http://ninten.do/6017pAnWx

Famicom Detective Club: The Girl Who Stands Behind:
http://ninten.do/6010pAnW0

#FamicomDetectiveClub #NintendoSwitch #NintendoDirect

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
